item.title: Coffee is back in Licton Springs!
item.description:
We've just been given news we couldn't be happier to report:

Pilgrim Coffee is coming to Oak Tree plaza!

Starting tomorrow Pilgrim Coffee will be operating at 10002 Aurora Ave N Monday - Wednesday 7-10 AM, and we've heard rumors that if demand is high enough they may expand their hours â€¦
item.dc:creator: timothycrosley
